originalText.text:
Bristal is an amazing place. Our father has been at 2 other senior assisted living centers and this one is by far the best. The place is beautifully appointed, the rooms and facilities are specifically designed for the residents to access everything easily. There is dedicated support staff on each floor. Dining options on many floors and food is pretty delicious for a senior assisted living home and we can easily just join in for a meal at the cafe or on dadâ€™s floor. They know what he loves to eat and what he needs. They have plenty of activities and trips to attend that heâ€™s done more while heâ€™s been here than most of his dedicated work/life.

But what makes this senior assisted living place special is the great staff, their personal attention and friendship with each resident and their genuine care for what my dad personally needs. Heâ€™s happy, well kept and has fewer incidents. We do have to communicate with them on what he needs and how he needs it but the Bristal team steps up, is attentive and they follows through.

My dad is in great condition and happy now. We saw a picture of him on the day he moved in to Bristal a year ago. Today dad looks happier, healthier and he actually looks more vibrant and even younger. We attribute a good deal of this to the amazing team and the great care he gets here. ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: Compared to other facilities I have went to for information The Bristal Assisted Living at York Avenue is by far the best, The reception received there from the Receptionist Tay at the front was very amazing, I then spoke with the marketing department and oh boy she was even better. I also had the opportunity to have a moment with the ED Ryan and overall, they are 10/10 for me. I have since told my friends about them.

I also had the opportunity to have a moment with the ED Ryan and overall, they are 10/10 for me. I have since told my friends about them.

originalText.text: I recently visited, and I must say that it's a fantastic assisted living facility. The staff is incredibly professional, kind, and empathetic, and they provide top-notch care to their residents. I had the pleasure of interacting with two employees, Jenny and Melanie, who went above and beyond to make my experience at The Bristal even better. They had a great rapport with the residents and were so patient and kind with them. I could see that they genuinely care about their well-being and go the extra mile to make them comfortable. Their positive attitude and warm personalities made me feel welcome and at ease. I highly recommend The Bristal's York Avenue location to anyone looking for a top-notch assisted living facility. Jenny and Melanie are shining examples of the amazing work being done at The Bristal, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to have interacted with them during my visit.

originalText.text: The Bristal assisted living facility on York Ave is an excellent choice for seniors who need a little extra help with daily activities. The staff is caring and attentive, and the facility is clean and well-maintained. The apartments are spacious and comfortable, and there are plenty of activities and amenities to keep residents engaged and active. The location is also convenient, with easy access to nearby shops, restaurants, and medical facilities. Overall, the Bristal is a great option for seniors looking for a supportive and welcoming community to call home.
